title: pan murai
sahitya:
pan murai shonnEnE en kurai tannai nAn unniDam ovvonrAi SaNmukha semmalE


anupallavi

  en muraiyITTinai pan murai kETTum nI innumE irakkam illAdsirukkalAmO


caraNam    punnakai pUttiDum un mukha pArttu enniru karangaLai ovvonrAi shErttu
ponnaDi tannilE en shiram sAittu un panniru sevikkum paTTiDumpaDikkE
